Organization of American States

text.#text:
The Charter of
			 the Organization of American States recognizes that—

representative
			 democracy is indispensable for the stability, peace, and development of the
			 Western Hemisphere; and

a purpose of the
			 Organization of American States is to promote and consolidate representative
			 democracy, with due respect for the principle of nonintervention.

The United States
			 supports the purposes and principles enshrined in—

the Charter of
			 the Organization of American States;

the
			 Inter-American Democratic Charter; and

the American
			 Declaration on the Rights and Duties of Man.

It is the policy of the
			 United States—

to promote

to support the
			 practices, purposes, and principles expressed in the Charter of the
			 Organization of American States, the American Declaration on the Rights and
			 Duties of Man, the Inter-American Democratic Charter, and other fundamental
			 instruments of democracy.
